name: Silent House (itch)
description:
Silent House is a short PS1 style survival horror game.

You play as John Williams, the victim of a car accident. You wake your unconscious body and find yourself in a weird room that resembles a prison cell. You make eye contact with a strange man with a bloody knife that looks awfully similar to the psychopath that you saw in the newspaper. You must escape at all costs or die (not recommended).  

Controls:

  • WASD - MOVEMENT
  • E - INTERACT
  •  I - INVENTORY 
  • F3 - RETURN TO MENU                          
  • F3 - QUIT THE GAME WHILE IN MENU

Note: 

  • Headphones are recommended
  • The game was only playtested on Windows and Android if you run into any bugs or can't start the game. Contact me on discord.
  • If you get stuck on any puzzle you can find the walkthrough here.

Discord Server- https://discord.gg/9SmMyXs

My laptop's fan just stopped working so donating really helps me out :)
